message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today at a price of $20,000. I believe it offers significant value at this price point. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. I've done some research and I believe it's a bit overpriced at $20,000.

Bob, I appreciate your interest. While I understand your perspective on the price, I believe my initial offer reflects the true value of this product. I'm willing to come down slightly to $18,000.  This is my final offer.
I appreciate your flexibility, but $18,000 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $14,000 for the product. I'm confident that's a fair price considering the market value.
